title: NBA Shot Visualizer
description: In preparation for the NBA playoffs, I put together a web-app that helps you visualize your favourite player's best shot regions.

title: COVID-19 Tracker
description: Visualizing global COVID-19 cases. A bit late to the party, but may unfortunately come in handy as we enter a second wave.

title: Quizzo
description: Building a quiz app for my elementary-school-aged sisters to keep track of their science trivia.

title: Gait Cycle Analysis for Parkinson's Patients
description: Did some real-time signal processing to identify freezing points in the gait cycle for Parkinson's patients. Provided them with a vibrational cue to get back on track.
